Saved File Should Exist [ Arguments ] ${path}
[ Document ] Checks that saved file exists and is newer than given timestamp
File Should Exist ${path}
${filetime} = Get Modified Time ${path}
Fail Unless '${filetime}' >= '${START TIME}'
